description:
Something different today. I need some shelf space to fit more Legions Imperialis and Tomb Kings on, so I'm selling my small collection of Necromunda models. A Ridgehauler, a trailer, the containers, barrels and boxes and two Outrider Quads.

The post For sale: Necromunda Cargo-8 Ridgehauler, Trailer and Orlock Outrider Quads appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: For sale: Necromunda Cargo-8 Ridgehauler,  Trailer and Orlock Outrider Quads
